title: Dj Sona question
body: How to share the dj sona's music with teammates?

replies.body:
Hey KefLO,

Your allies will need to opt into the music experience by holding tab and clicking on the music note icon, located on the far left of the screen (not on the scorecard).

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=E6XIxhwr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-26T00:19:53.490+0000)
>
> Hey KefLO,
> 
> Your allies will need to opt into the music experience by holding tab and clicking on the music note icon, located on the far left of the screen (not on the scorecard).

Question. Can this somehow be changed as a sound effect? I usually disable my music in the options because I don't like to have summoner's rift music playing, but this means I have to re-enable it in the options to listen to DJ sona (if she's in a a game). If her music was treated as a different type of music or sound option, it would be great to not have to keep flipping the options back and forth everytime a DJ sona is in my game (or i'm playing her).
I can't promise we'll make a change to it, but I'd be happy to pass your feedback on.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=E6XIxhwr,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-02-26T00:30:36.777+0000)
>
> I can't promise we'll make a change to it, but I'd be happy to pass your feedback on.

Alright sweet. Actually now that i think about it though, it would be difficult to impliment without something that auto mutes the normal music, otherwise both tracks would play over each other, but even just a hotkey that allows us to quickly mute/unmute the music would be great.
Just saw DJ Sona in game, LOL looks like trash.
lol what are you talking about, it's the best looking skin in the game....as far as ultimate skins go.
I'm glad you like it. I'm not impressed, especially considering the cost.
